description: This table stores service line information for managed care estimates.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONTEXT_LINE
columns.description: The LINE in the PR_EST_AP_CLAIM table that stores the claim information that this service line is associated with.

columns.name: PROC_MODS
columns.description: The modifiers associated with the service line.

columns.name: PROC_QTY
columns.description: The procedure quantity associated with the service line.

columns.name: CHG_AMT
columns.description: The billed amount associated with the service line.

columns.name: SYS_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The system-calculated billed amount associated with the service line detail.

columns.name: ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The allowed amount associated with the service line.

columns.name: SYS_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The system-calculated allowed amount associated with the service line detail.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_AMT
columns.description: The self-pay amount associated with the service line.

columns.name: SYS_SELF_PAY_AMT
columns.description: The system-calculated self-pay amount associated with the service line detail.

columns.name: MC_ADDL_LINE
columns.description: The LINE in the PR_EST_ADDL_INFO table that stores additional information about the service line.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The AP Claims transaction (ETR) ID associated with this estimate procedure line.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUIRED_YN
columns.description:
Identifies if an authorization is required for the procedure line to be covered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: The Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) associated with the service line detail.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.
